title: "SISE"
output: github_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, fig.asp=9/16, fig.retina = 2)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggcpesrthemes)

theme_set(theme_cpesr())
theme_cpesr_setup(authors = "Julien Gossa", source="fr-esr-sise-effectifs-d-etudiants-inscrits-esr-public")
```

```{r etl, eval=FALSE}
sise <- read.csv2("../data/fr-esr-sise-effectifs-d-etudiants-inscrits-esr-public.csv", dec=".", stringsAsFactors=TRUE) %>%
  group_by(
    Rentrée = rentree,
    Type.d.établissement,
    Etablissement,
    pid = etablissement_id_paysage_actuel,
    Grande.discipline,
    Secteur.disciplinaire,
    SEXE,
    DN_DE,
    Attractivité.internationale,
    LMD = factor(CURSUS_LMD, levels = c("L","M","D")),
    NIVEAU #= ifelse(DIPLOME == "LIC_PRO", "3", NIVEAU)
  ) %>%
  summarise(Etudiants = sum(Nombre.d.étudiants.inscrits..inscriptions.principales..hors.étudiants.inscrits.en.parallèle.en.CPGE,na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup()

save(sise, file="sise.RData")
```
```{r load}
load(file="sise.RData")
```

## Tout 

```{r tout}
sise %>% 
  mutate(LMD = fct_rev(LMD)) %>%
  group_by(Rentrée, LMD) %>%
  summarise(Etudiants = sum(Etudiants)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Rentrée, y= Etudiants, fill=LMD, group_by(LMD))) +
  geom_area(color="white") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = ~ .x / 1e6, name = "Etudiants (millions)") +
  theme_cpesr_cap()
```


## Disciplines

```{r gdisc, results='asis', fig.asp=9/16}
sise %>% 
  mutate(LMD = fct_rev(LMD)) %>%
  filter(Rentrée == max(Rentrée)) %>%
  group_by(LMD, Grande.discipline) %>%
  summarise(Etudiants = sum(Etudiants)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(y=reorder(Grande.discipline,Etudiants, FUN=sum),x=Etudiants,fill=LMD)) +
  geom_col()
```

```{r disc, results='asis', fig.asp=4/3}
sise %>% 
  mutate(LMD = fct_rev(LMD)) %>%
  filter(Rentrée == max(Rentrée)) %>%
  group_by(LMD, Secteur.disciplinaire) %>%
  summarise(Etudiants = sum(Etudiants)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(y=reorder(Secteur.disciplinaire,Etudiants, FUN=sum),x=Etudiants,fill=LMD)) +
  geom_col()
```


### L3 vs M1

```{r l3m1.niveaux}
sise %>%
  group_by(Rentrée,Niveau = paste(LMD,NIVEAU, sep="-")) %>%
  summarise(Etudiants = sum(Etudiants)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Rentrée, y= Etudiants, fill=Niveau)) +
  geom_area(color="white") +
  facet_wrap(Niveau~., labeller = as_labeller(label_wrap_gen(50))) +
  theme(legend.position = "None") +
  theme_cpesr_cap()
```



```{r l3m1}
sise %>%
  group_by(Rentrée,Niveau = paste(LMD,NIVEAU, sep="-")) %>%
  summarise(Etudiants = sum(Etudiants)) %>%
  filter(Niveau %in% c("L-03","M-01")) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Rentrée, y= Etudiants, color=Niveau)) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 1.5) + geom_point(shape = 21, stroke = 2, size = 2, fill="white") + 
  theme(legend.position = "None") +
  theme_cpesr_cap()
```

```{r l3m1.decal}
sise %>%
  group_by(Rentrée,Niveau = paste(LMD,NIVEAU, sep="-")) %>%
  summarise(Etudiants = sum(Etudiants)) %>%
  filter(Niveau %in% c("L-03","M-01")) %>%
  mutate(Rentrée = ifelse(Niveau == "L-03", Rentrée-1,Rentrée)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Rentrée, y= Etudiants, color=Niveau)) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 1.5) + geom_point(shape = 21, stroke = 2, size = 2, fill="white") + 
  theme(legend.position = "None") +
  theme_cpesr_cap()
```


```{r l3m1.gd}
sise %>%
  filter(Grande.discipline != "Santé") %>%
  group_by(Rentrée,Niveau = paste(LMD,NIVEAU, sep="-"), Grande.discipline) %>%
  summarise(Etudiants = sum(Etudiants)) %>%
  filter(Niveau %in% c("L-03","M-01")) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Rentrée, y= Etudiants, color=Niveau)) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 1) + geom_point(shape = 21, stroke = 1.5, size = 1.5, fill="white") + 
  facet_wrap(Grande.discipline~., scales = "free_y") +
  theme(legend.position = "None") +
  theme_cpesr_cap()
```

```{r l3m1.gd.decal}
sise %>%
  filter(Grande.discipline != "Santé") %>%
  group_by(Rentrée,Niveau = paste(LMD,NIVEAU, sep="-"), Grande.discipline) %>%
```

## Informatique

### Effectifs

```{r info}
info <- sise %>%
  filter(Secteur.disciplinaire == "Informatique")
```


```{r info.LMD, results='asis'}
info.LMD <- info %>%
  group_by(Rentrée,LMD) %>%
  summarise(Etudiants = sum(Etudiants)) 

info.LMD %>% pivot_wider(names_from = LMD, values_from = Etudiants) %>% spoiler_table()
```

```{r info.LMD.plot}
info.LMD %>%
  mutate(LMD = fct_rev(LMD)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Rentrée, y= Etudiants, fill=LMD, group_by(LMD))) +
  geom_area(color="white") +
  theme_cpesr_cap()
```
